message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good amount.
Alice, I understand you want a good deal, but so do I. This is my counter-offer.
Bob, let's be realistic. Time is literally money for me in this game.  This offer is still good for both of us.
Alice, I'm willing to compromise, but the deal has to be fair for both of us. This is my final offer.
